name: DualSense Haptic Feedback Demo
description:
This is a demo of DualSense Haptic Feedback on PC using the Godot Third Person Demo. The source code for that project is available here. To be able to experience this demo properly you will need a DualSense Controller wired to your PC.

Instructions:

 

Step 1: Right click on the volume icon and click "Sounds".

Step 2: Click on the "Playback" tab near the top left.

Step 3: Right click on "Speakers 2-Wireless Controller and click on Properties

Step 4: Click on the "Enhancements" tab and make sure "Speaker Fill" is checked.

Step 5: Press "OK" at the bottom of the sound window. 

You should be all set to play this game. To hear the game audio you will need to plug in headphones to the DualSense. If the rumble isn't working in game for you try pressing the "R" key on the keyboard until the wireless controller text is shown.
